Text: Thanks a lot,finally a rip with the Extras.
How do I play the files WITH the commentaries? When I play them with Windows Media Player and Dvix player it just plays the normal episodes.

Try to use VLC Media Player or Media Player Classic. 

In VLC after you've started the video you just right click, Audio -> Audio Track -> Track 2

You mean the torrent? Well, they only allow Magnet links on Piratebay now (so they don't even host the .torrent files) and it's a 'problem' with Magnet links that doesn't show the info. You have to manually choose the files you would not like to download in the uTorrent client under the Files tab for an active torrent.
